items.text: back of a length on off, blocked
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: back of a length, cut to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: floated up on off, hammered down to long-off
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: length, spins away, tries to play at it and gets beaten
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: gets forward to defend and gets an outside edge to short third man.. and has there been a run-out here? Yes, Gayle is caught short of his crease. Miscommunication costs them a wicket. Gayle calls for the single, and to be fair to him, he was running towards the danger end. But Hetmyer sends him back and the bowler collects the throw and takes the bails off. Too late to recover for the big man
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, OUT

dismissal.text: CH Gayle run out (Mahmudullah/Mosaddek Hossain) 40 (60b 1x4 2x6) SR: 66.66

items.text: skids on and finds the inside of the bat to the on side
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: shifts back and whips wide of long-on
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: length, spins in, nudged to square leg

items.text: fullish, cuts in and flicked to midwicket

items.text: full, angled into the pads, clipped out to deep backward square leg

items.text: pushes to point on the front foot

items.text: short outside off, rides the bounce and drops to point

items.text: backs away and punches to deep point.. another risky single

items.text: advances and drills it back

items.text: pushes away from the body and gets an edge to third man

items.text: hammers a fuller one straight through long-on
